casebody.data:
WALKER & STATEN
v.
FLEETWOOD HOMES. No. 223A06. Supreme Court of North Carolina. July 20, 2006. Philip J. Mohr, Winston-Salem, for Fleetwood Homes. William F. Ward, III, for Walkers.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 17th day of July 2006 by Defendant for Extension of Time to File Brief:

"Motion Allowed. Defendant (Fleetwood Homes) shall have up to and including the 30th day of August 2006 to file and serve his/her brief with this Court. By order of the Court in conference this the 20th day of July 2006."
